DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine whether remote monitoring diabetes management effective help patient manage disease standard disease management program .
DOC.detailed_description: To determine whether remote monitoring diabetes management effective help patient manage disease .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Between 18 64 year age January 1 , 2008 Diagnosis diabetes mellitus ( list ICD9CM diagnosis code two outpatient claim , one inpatient admission emergency room claim recent 12month period ) Continuously enrol health plan pharmacy medical benefit recent 12month period one period nonenrollment 30 day Able provide write informed consent study participation Exclusion Criteria Advanced renal disease ( one claim recent 12month period ) define claim nephropathy creatinine great 2.5 mg/dl Selected cancer ( one claim recent 12month period ) HIV/AIDS ( one claim recent 12month period ) Heart , liver , kidney , multiple organ transplant ( one claim recent 12month period ) Cirrhosis liver ( one claim recent 12month period ) Current participation another LifeScan study diabetesrelated clinical trial Medicare primary source insurance coverage Unable understand write spoken English
